tasks.name: Cooking
tasks.description: The process of preparing food and using a stove, oven, air fryer, etc. to cook the dish of your desire.

tasks.name: Sweeping
tasks.description: The process of taking a broom and dustpan and collecting the dust, dirt, and debry off of the floor and transferring it from the floor to the dustpan then discarding it.

tasks.name: Decluttering
tasks.description: The process of sorting and organizing storage or other rooms to get rid of unwanted items and organizing the items that are wanted.
